content: please don t forget to like or comment when you download this free pattern i would love to hear your feedback <hr> laurence is a perfect blanket for the special little one a simple knit with an eyelet stitch pattern which depending on how you orient the blanket translates to dainty blooms whimsical abodes or playful arrowheads while the sample is knitted in dk weight yarn the blanket is highly scalable and can be made with any yarn weight why not make a bigger lap blanket to baby yourself as well **q&a for the pattern is here 1 please also feel free to share your fo photos here 2 ** 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/vicky-chan-designs/3765763/ 2 https //www ravelry com/discuss/vicky-chan-designs/2945786/476-500
